title: Thesis Worker
description: • Currently writing my thesis work at IKEA within Machine Learning and Al- Driven Predictive Event Orchestration for Scalable Data Pipelines at the Customer Order 360 team.

title: Mobile Engineering Intern (iOS)
description:
• Worked with every day tasks on the iOS-client of Spotify, specifically the unlaunched Audiobooks page (launch 3rd October on several markets). 

• My work included bug fixes and introducing new features, lifting data to the model layer and displaying it in the app. 

• Other tasks also included unit tests and UI tests. We worked agile, primarily using Jira, standups everyday and retros after each sprint. 

• Swift, UIKit, SwiftUI, Git, Bazel, protocol oriented programming.
